cost_per_yalm.label: Cost Per Yalm
cost_per_yalm.tooltip: Penalty to fate score modifier, based on distance to fate.

time_to_teleport.label: Seconds To Teleport
time_to_teleport.tooltip: How many seconds it takes to teleport and load.

bonus_fate_modifier.label: Bonus Fate Modifier
bonus_fate_modifier.tooltip: Score bonus for fates with a bonus.

unstarted_fate_modifier.label: Unstarted Fate Modifier
unstarted_fate_modifier.tooltip: Score bonus for fates that haven't been started.

time_required_to_consider_fate.label: Seconds Required To Consider Fate
time_required_to_consider_fate.tooltip: How many seconds should be required in a fates estimated completion time, after an estimated arrival time.

in_progress_fate_modifier.label: In Progress Fate Modifier
in_progress_fate_modifier.tooltip:
Score bonus for fates that are already in progress but above the required seconds threshold.
This bonus is applied multiplicatively to the estimated time remaining after pathing to the fate.
